HegemonPack:RelicID.NAME: Good Relic
HegemonPack:RelicID.FLAVOR: Flavor text displayed in detailed relic view.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. [E] is an energy icon.

HegemonPack:PhasedMysteriousStranger.NAME: Phased Mysterious Stranger
HegemonPack:PhasedMysteriousStranger.FLAVOR: That isn't meant to be in this world. Whoever put it here likes you. Hopefully.
DESCRIPTIONS: [#0000ff]Global. Replaces #rMysterious #rStranger. On gaining a debuff, gain 1 Artifact.

HegemonPack:PaperUmbrella.NAME: Paper Umbrella
HegemonPack:PaperUmbrella.FLAVOR: This is wildly out of place. A good find, nevertheless.
DESCRIPTIONS: [#0000ff]Global. Sin increases Necrotic damage by #b10% instead of #b7%.

HegemonPack:StarterRelic.NAME: Starter Relic
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, if you have more energy than you need to play your hand, enter *Eclipse.
